title: Foreign Language Proficiency and Intercultural Understanding Enhancement Program Through Remote Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language proficiency and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A mobile-based learning environment for current professionals, emphasizing flexible learning with personal devices and asynchronous collaborative activities for intercultural communication

learning_goals: Collaborate with remotely connected global peers to improve intermediate-level foreign language communication skills by 20%
Learners can analyze and comparatively explain differences across at least three cultural contexts (festivals, business etiquette, and daily communication).
Learners systematically document and share intercultural experiential reflections through digital portfolios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
